pageContent: Objective: To evaluate the ability of contrast-enhanced transrectal ultrasound (CETRUS) scanning for prostate cancer detection in different area, compared with conventional transrectal ultrasound (TRUS).

metaData.source:
Salvage Hemiablation High Intensity Focused Ultrasound for unilateral radio-recurrent prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31400963/
